channel.title: Remove/isolate virtualbox contamination in Qubes-Whonix
channel.description:
Whonix version 4.0.1-201811040215
```` user@host:~$ apt list | grep virtualbox
WARNING: apt does not have a stable CLI interface. Use with caution in scripts.
apparmor-profile-virtualbox/unknown 3:1.7-1 all virtualbox-guest-dkms/unknown 5.2.18-dfsg-1~bpo9+1 all virtualbox-guest-utils/unknown 5.2.18-dfsg-1~bpo9+1 amd64 virtualbox-guest-x11/unknown 5.2.18-dfsg-1~bpo9+1 amd64 user@host:~$ ````

item.title: Remove/isolate virtualbox contamination in Qubes-Whonix
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
true just checked back and there wasnt truly package been installed.

WARNING: apt does not have a stable CLI interface. Use with caution in scripts.

virtualbox-guest-utils/unknown 5.2.18-dfsg-1~bpo9+1 amd64
